content.query:
-- trova lo skew di una tabella
DBCC PDW_SHOWSPACEUSED('[dbo].[Trip]');
---
DBCC PDW_SHOWSPACEUSED('[dbo].[HackneyLicense]');

-- mostra le tabelle che hanno uno skewness > 10%
select *
from dbo.vTableSizes
where two_part_name in
    (
    select two_part_name
    from dbo.vTableSizes
    where row_count > 0
    group by two_part_name
    having (max(row_count * 1.000) - min(row_count * 1.000))/max(row_count * 1.000) >= .10
    )
order by two_part_name, row_count;

-- peso in GB della tabella -> solo la Trip e' distribuita uniformemente, le altre no perche'?
select 
    table_name
    ,sum(reserved_space_GB) as reserved_space_GB
    ,sum(data_space_GB) as data_space_GB
from dbo.vTableSizes
group by table_name;
